entry.title: Ukraine Digs for Survivors in Rubble of Apartment Building Destroyed by Russian Missile
entry.content: Death toll rises to 19 killed in missile strike on apartment building in Chasiv Yar; eight survivors have been rescued.

entry.title: Ukraine War Pushes Millions of the World's Poorest Toward Starvation
entry.content: Malnutrition wards in Somalia are overflowing, with children bearing the brunt as prices of food staples surge since Russiaâ€™s invasion of Ukraine.

entry.title: U.K. Weighs Saying Cheerio to Metric System. Opponent: 'This Is Insane.'
entry.content: Freed of an EU edict, government formally studies dumping meters and embracing old measurements.
